result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: Race is not discussed publicly in America.
result.ga: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblí
result.orig: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblí
result.html: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblíRace is not discussed publicly in America.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṗléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblíRace is not discussed publicly in America.

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.orig: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.html: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibriṫe a ṁeallaḋ as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: Cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na Stát Aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.

result.eng: Black people did not have full rights.
result.ga: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine Gorma
result.orig: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine Gorma
result.html: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine GormaBlack people did not have full rights.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cearta iomlána ag daoine GormaBlack people did not have full rights.

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ga: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.orig: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.html: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ponchtml: In 1856 rialaiġ Cúirt Uaċtaraċ na Stát Aontaiṫe nár ḃain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ponchtml: Ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.html: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ponchtml: Ċan dólás croí aċ sólás croí a ḃí ar Ṡéimí nuair a ḃí a ḟaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.

result.eng: The sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ga: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.orig: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.html: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibhThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ an ġrian agus noċt na caisleáin óir fá ġiota dóiḃThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.

result.eng: He could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ga: Ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.orig: Ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.html: Ní raibh sásamh le déanamh airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sásaṁ le déanaṁ airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.

result.eng: Nothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ga: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú
result.orig: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú
result.html: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog ḟéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.

result.eng: We may be related but we are not alike.
result.ga: Más gaolmhar ní cosúil
result.orig: Más gaolmhar ní cosúil
result.html: Más gaolmhar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.
result.ponchtml: Más gaolṁar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.eng: He could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ga: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.orig: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.html: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmhaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiocfaḋ leis a ġaḃáil ċun an ḃaile ar ṗócaí folṁaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
